english: He who has overcome his fears will truly be free.
chinese: 克服了恐惧的人才能获得真正的自由。
author: Aristotle（亚里士多德）

english: The honor of a man's virtue honor I don't know how many times larger than his wealth.
chinese: 人的美德的荣誉比他的财富的荣誉不知大多少倍。
author: Leonardo da Vinci（达·芬奇）

english: 13. Those who can not do trivial things can not accomplish great things.
chinese: 不会做小事的人，也做不出大事来。
author: Lomonosov（罗蒙诺索夫）

english: Because of time fleeting, cannot be redeemed, so it is the most precious wealth in the world. Time is undoubtedly the most pointless abuse a way of killing.
chinese: 由于时光转瞬即逝，无法挽回，所以说它是世间最宝贵的财富。滥用时光无疑是人们最没有意义的一种消磨方式。
author: W. Somerset Maugham（毛姆）

english: A challenge is to prove your ability to yourself, and others a chance.
chinese: 一次挑战就是向自己和他人证明你能力的一次机会。
author: Joe Brown（乔·布朗）

english: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
chinese: 别盯着时钟看；要像它一样，保持前进。
author: Sam Levenson（山姆・莱文森）

english: Get the mind deep submergence, He Li unavailable, the ambition to go up, what not to do.
chinese: 把意念深潜得下，何理不可得，把志气奋发起，何事不可做。
author: Lv Kun（吕坤）

english: Pure of heart, life is full of sweet and joy.
chinese: 心灵纯洁的人，生活充满甜蜜和喜悦。
author: Leo Tolstoy（列夫·托尔斯泰）

english: Shallow men believe in luck. Self-trust isthe first secret of success.
chinese: 肤浅的人相信运气，而成功的首要秘诀是自信。
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson（拉尔夫·沃尔多·爱默生）

english: It's kind of fun to do the impossible.
chinese: 做不可能的事蛮有趣的。
author: Walt Disney（华特・迪士尼）

english: You have your way. I have my way. As for the right way, the correct way, and the only way, it does not exist.
chinese: 你有你的路。我有我的路。至于适当的路，正确的路和唯一的路，这样的路并不存在。
author: Friedrich Nietzsche（尼采）

english: Clouds pour the water in the river of water glass, hiding themselves in the distant hills.
chinese: 云把水倒在河的水杯里，它们自己却藏在远山之中。
author: Rabindranath Tagore（泰戈尔）

english: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
chinese: 唯一不可能的行程，是你从未启程的那个。
author: Tony Robbins（托尼・罗宾）

english: Life is like playing chess, must have a vision in order to win.
chinese: 人生如下棋，必须有远见方能获胜。
author: Robert Barham（巴克斯顿）

english: However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.
chinese: 不管生活多么困难，总是有你可以做及取得成功的事。
author: Stephen Hawking（史蒂芬・霍金）

english: People who say that yesterday was better than today are ultimately devaluing their own existence.
chinese: 说昨天比今天好的人，其实就是在贬低自己的存在。
author: Karl Lagerfeld（卡尔・拉格斐）

english: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
chinese: 永远全力以赴，今日播下的种子，终会得到丰收。
author: Og Mandino（奥格・曼迪诺）

english: Should do not do today, tomorrow early and delayed again.
chinese: 今天应做的事没有做，明天再早也是耽误了。
author: Pestalozzi（裴斯泰洛齐）

english: You have to believe in yourself. That's the secret of success.
chinese: 人必须相信自己，这是成功的秘诀。
author: Charles Chaplin（查尔斯・卓别林）

english: People who are good at using sporadic time, to make greater achievements.
chinese: 善于利用零星时间的人，才会做出更大的成绩来。
author: Hua Luogeng（华罗庚）

english: Man errs as long as he strives.
chinese: 失误是进取的代价。
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe（歌德）

english: What you do speaks so loudly that I cannot hear what you say.
chinese: 你的行为声音如此之大，以至于我听不见你在说什么。
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson（拉尔夫・瓦尔多・爱默生）

english: And gladly would learn, and gladly teach.
chinese: 勤于学习的人才能乐意施教。
author: Geoffrey Chaucer（杰弗里·乔叟）

english: Some mistakes just have greater consequences than others. But you don't have to let the result of one mistake be the thing that defines you.
chinese: 有些错误代价特别大，但你不该让一个过错定义了自己。
author: Me Before You（我就要你好好的）

english: Man's knowledge more wide, the person's itself also will be.
chinese: 人的知识愈广，人的本身也愈臻完善。
author: Maxim Gorky（高尔基）

english: Education is what remains after one has forgotten everything one has learned in school.
chinese: 教育就是当一个人把在学校所学全部忘光之后剩下的东西。
author: Albert Einstein（爱因斯坦）

english: Happiness is the settling of the soul into its most appropriate spot.
chinese: 幸福是把灵魂安放在最适当的位置。
author: Aristotle（亚里士多德）

english: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
chinese: 我们惟一不得不害怕的就是害怕本身。
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt（富兰克林·罗斯福）

english: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
chinese: 与内在的力量相比，过去和未来都是微不足道的。
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson（拉尔夫・瓦尔多・爱默生）

english: Stop struggling, life is stopped.
chinese: 停止奋斗，生命也就停止了。
author: Thomas Carlyle（托马斯·卡莱尔）

english: Knowledge can change your fate and English can accomplish your future.
chinese: 知识改变命运，英文成就未来。
author: Unknown

english: I often regret due to talk, but never regret because of silence.
chinese: 我常因说话而后悔，但却从未因沈默而后悔。
author: Cicero（西那斯）

english: Love is like the moon; when it does not increase, it decreases.
chinese: 爱情就像月亮，不增则减。
author: Unknown

english: The most terrible enemy is no strong belief.
chinese: 最可怕的敌人，就是没有坚强的信念。
author: Romain Rolland（罗曼·罗兰）

english: If you really want to do something, you'll find a way. If you don't, you'll find an excuse.
chinese: 如果你真的很想做一件事，你就会找到方法；如果你不是很想，你就会找到借口。
author: Unknown

english: Man can not live like beasts, should pursue knowledge and virtue.
chinese: 人不能象走兽那样活着，应该追求知识和美德。
author: Dante Alighieri（但丁）

english: A cool listener is not only popular everywhere, and will slowly know many things.
chinese: 一个冷静的倾听者，不但到处受人欢迎，而且会逐渐知道许多事情。
author: Woodrow Wilson（威尔逊）

english: I don't do anything unless I can give it 100%.
chinese: 我不做任何事，除非我能100%投入。
author: David Beckham（大卫・贝克汉姆）

english: A laugh can be a very powerful thing.
chinese: 笑容是个有力量的东西。
author: Unknown

english: Wise man warns me that life is but a dewdrop on the lotus leaf.
chinese: 聪明的人警告我说，生命只是一颗荷叶上的露珠。
author: Rabindranath Tagore（泰戈尔）

english: If you look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.
chinese: 如果你仔细观察，大部分的一夕成功都花了很长一段时间。
author: Unknown

english: Faults are sick when love is thin.
chinese: 一朝情意淡，样样不顺眼。
author: Unknown

english: No cross, no crown.
chinese: 不经历风雨，怎么遇见彩虹。
author: Unknown

english: Time is made up of a split second product, good at using sporadic time person, will make greater achievement.
chinese: 时间是由分秒积成的，善于利用零星时间的人，才会做出更大的成绩来。
author: Hua Luogeng（华罗庚）

english: If people are devotedly to do something, always can meet by chance.
chinese: 人们若是一心一意地做某一件事，总是会碰到偶然的机会的。
author: Honoré de Balzac（巴尔扎克）

english: Life's a little bit messy. We all make mistakes. No matter what type of animal you are, change starts with you.
chinese: 生活总会有那么点不顺心，我们都会犯错。天性如何并不重要，改变都由你开始。
author: Zootopia（动物方城市）

english: Blessed is he who expects nothing, for he shall never be disappointed.
chinese: 一无所求的人是幸福的，因为他永远也不会失望。
author: Alexander Pope（亚历山大·蒲柏）

english: A man's best friends are his ten fingers.
chinese: 人最好的朋友是自己的10只手指。
author: Unknown

english: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
chinese: 人生就像骑自行车,要保持平衡就要不断前进。
author: Albert Einstein
